title: that moment you have 124 rp (1 rp off of a hextech box lol)
body:
https://gyazo.com/03dd4dee05e52ecb5784597e20d4fcfc

that moment when u are 1 rp off of a hextech box 

ive been cucked

replies.body: MS Paint drawing of your favourite champion lets go! :)
when mecha zero sion first game out i was 69 rp off

A somewhat popular way to get some free RP for cases such as this one is directly asking for it via a support ticket which you alongside attach a legendary-ly bad MS Paint picture of your own on the said ticket, and they may give you some RP as long as it's lower than 15 or something. It only works once per account too I think.

Who knows.
